

I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '2';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = 'nuffqid2o2g6hpudqnq1ae02j5' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121206';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121206' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT customers_id, customers_firstname, customers_lastname, customers_password,
                                    customers_email_address, customers_default_address_id,
                                    customers_authorization, customers_referral
                           FROM customers
                           WHERE customers_email_address = 'test@test.com';



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT entry_country_id, entry_zone_id
                              FROM address_book
                              WHERE customers_id = 1
                              AND address_book_id = 1;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, customers_basket_quantity
                         from customers_basket
                         where customers_id = '1'
                         order by customers_basket_id;



I AM HERE login
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '8eupfald5ep4l7p0g949stdej2';
